titleStmt.title: The Northern star, The British monarchy, or, The northern the fourth universal monarchy Charles II, and his successors, the founders of the northern, last, fourth and most happy monarchy : being a collection of many choice ancient and modern prophecies ; wherein also the fates of the Roman, French, and Spanish monarchies are occasionally set out.
titleStmt.author: Tonge, Ezerel, 1621-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. D. and are to be sold by most booksellers,

notesStmt.note: "To the Imperial Majesty of Charles ..." signed E. T.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
